title: Ronnie Wood - Slide On This (1992) [EAC-FLAC]
description:
Ronnie Wood - Slide On This (1992) [EAC-FLAC]
              EAC rip (secure mode) | FLAC (tracks)+CUE+LOG -> 421 Mb
                      Full Artwork @ 300 dpi (jpg) -> 55 Mb


Slide on This is Ronnie Wood's best record. Written in collaboration with Bernard Fowler (backing vocalist of the Rolling Stones, and lead singer in several Charlie Watts'records) is very inspired and very intriguing. Testify, Breathe on Me and Always Wanted More are among Ronnie's best songs everâ€“they're as fresh as 'I can feel the fire' but they have better lyrics. The record is enriched by (the reproduction of) Ronnie's paintings. It's kind of curious that the Stones have only sporadically (pretty Beat Up, Dance, ..) used Ronnie's compositions. In any case, Slide on this is a must.
